text: Lilith Game Privacy Agreement
introduction:

This "Lilith Game Privacy Agreement" (hereinafter referred to as the "Privacy Agreement") is an inseparable part of the "Lilith Game License and Service Agreement" (hereinafter referred to as the "User Agreement").With Shanghai Lilith Network Technology Co., Ltd., the registered address is jointly concluded by Room 1116, Building 1, Building 1, No. 655, Yinxiang Road, Jiading District, Shanghai (hereinafter referred to as "Lilith" or "We").

Unless the user has read and accepted all the content of this privacy agreement, the user has no right to use Lilith games and services. Users use Lilith Games and services to be deemed to have read and agree to sign the privacy agreement.

Among them, "Wake -up of the Kingdom" mobile game software copyright owner is Chengdu Leh Dog Technology Co., Ltd., and our company has been authorized to provide users with the operating unit of the mobile game software of "Wake -ups of the Thousands of Kingdoms".
If you are a minor under the age of 18, you need to read this privacy agreement accompanied by your guardian, please and your guardian must read it carefully;
Please use the consent of your guardian to the entire terms of this privacy agreement to use the games and services provided by Lilith.
Lilith absolutely respects users' privacy and information, and will strictly protect your privacy and information.
When you use Lilith games and services, we may collect and use your personal information.
We hope to explain to you through this privacy agreement that we correspond to related matters such as collecting and using your personal information to better protect your rights and interests.
Here, the following explanations and explanations are made:
I. explanation of noun

Unless there is another agreement, the nouns used in this privacy agreement usually have the following definitions. If the privacy agreement is not specifically explained, the relevant term is consistent with the user agreement:
1. Personal information (Reference GB/T 35273-2020 "Information Security Technology Personal Information Security Specification"): refersVarious information.

Personal information example: Personal information (including personal name, birthday, gender, address, personal mobile phone number, email address, etc.), personal identity information (including identity documents), personal biometric information (including fingerprints, facial features),Network identity information (including system accounts, passwords, IP addresses, personal digital certificates, etc.), personal property information (including bank accounts, passwords, transactions and consumption records, virtual currency, virtual transactions, redemption codes and other virtual property information), communication), communication), communication), communication), communication), communication), communication), communication)The only device identification code, etc.), personal location information (including accurate positioning information, latitude and longitude, etc.).
The types of personal information we actually collected are described by this privacy agreement.

2. Personal sensitive information (refer to GB/T 35273-2020 "Information Security Technology Personal Information Security Specification"): It means that once leaked, illegally provided or abuses the security of people and property, it can easily lead to personal reputation and physical and mental health damage.Or personal information of discriminatory treatment.

Example of personal sensitive information: your personal property information, personal identity information, personal biometric information, address book information, friends list, group list, accurate positioning information, personal information of children under 14 years of age (inclusive).
The types of personal sensitive information we actually collect are based on the description of this privacy agreement.
3. Device: refers to devices that can be used to access or use Lilith games and services, such as tablets or smartphones.

4. The only device recognition code: refers to a string of characters edited into the device by the device manufacturer, which can be used to identify the corresponding device in a unique way (such as IMEI/Android ID/IDFA/Openudid/GUID/SIM card/IMSI informationwait).
5. IP address: Each device on the Internet will specify a number, called the Internet protocol (IP) address.
These numbers are usually specified according to geographical areas.

6. Cookie: Cookie is a small file containing string. When you log in and use the website or other network content, you can send and store it in your computer, mobile device or other devices (usually encrypted).
Similar cookies are other technologies that can be used as similar to cookies, such as: Web Beacon, Proxy, embedded script, etc.

7. Lilith account: also known as "account" and "user account", which refers to the account number that users successfully registered in accordance with the user agreement and related regulations and policies in accordance with Lilith games and services.

2. How do we collect and use personal information:, Lilith collects and uses your service process in accordance with laws and regulations and follow the principles of legitimate, legal, and necessary.personal information.
label: Data Security
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Lilith collects and uses personal information in accordance with the principles of legitimate, legal, and necessary.

text: If we want to use your personal information for other purposes that are not stated in this privacy agreement, or the information collected by specific purposes on other purposes, we will tell you in a reasonable way, and we will tell you in a reasonable way, andRebuild your consent again before use.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: The collected information collected for other purposes based on specific purposes, inform you in a timely manner, and obtain consent again before use.

text: The types of personal information we collect and use include two types: the first: the information necessary for our products and/or services of our products: this typeWe must authorize us to collect.
If you refuse to provide, you will not be able to use our products and/or services normally;

The second: additional business functions may need to be collected: This information is the information required for non -core business functions. You can choose whether to authorize us to collect it.

If you refuse and provide it, it will cause the additional business functions to be unable to achieve or to achieve the effect we intend to achieve, but it will not affect your normal use of core business and work function.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If it is refused to provide it, the additional business functions will not be achieved or effective, but it will not affect the normal use of core business functions.

text: We need to remind you in particular: Because our game products and services are more and the content provided for you is different, the core business functions (including the types of your personal information) will also be due to the content of the game product/service contentDifferent differences are different, and the specific game products/services are actually provided.

In addition, you understand and agree, and we hope that the game products and services that we hope to provide you are perfect, so we will continue to improve our game products and services, including technology, which means that we may often launch new businesses oftenFunctions may need to collect new personal information or change the purpose or method of using personal information.

If a function or game product/service that needs to collect your personal information is not explained in this privacy agreement, we will explain to you by updating this policy, page prompts, pop -ups, website announcements, etc.Letter, the purpose, content, usage and scope of interest collection, and provide you with the way you choose independently, and collect you clearly and collect it.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Will explain to you the purpose, content, usage method, and scope of information collection, and provide you with the way you choose to consent, and collect it after obtaining your consent.

text: In the process, if you have any doubts about related matters, you can contact us through the method of providing by Article 9 of the Privacy Agreement, and we will answer it as soon as possible.
In the process of using Lilith games and services, we usually collect and use your personal information in the following scenes:

1., account registration and identity authentication:, 1), when you register and log in to Lilith user account or use Lilith game products and services, you need to complete a series of registration procedures according to our finger.You need to provide us with the following information: account nickname, user head, portrait, mobile phone number, e -mail.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect the following information: account nickname, user avatar, mobile phone number, e -mail.

text: Collecting the above information is used to mark and identify your login information for Lilith users and save your login information.

The above information is a must -have information for you register and log in to Lilith user account or use Lilith game product and service core. If you choose not to provide, you may not be able to use Lilith game products and services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Risk
rewrite: The above information is an essential information for registered and logged in to Lilith user accounts or using core business. If it is not provided, Lilise game products and services may not be used.

text: 2), some of our game products and services support you to log in to the account (WeChat account number/QQ, account) of the third -party platform for login. If you log in with the account of the third -party platform, we will obtain the third party based on your authorization.Related letters under the account (including: third -party account number, user name, nickname, avatar, and other information you have authorized, specifically based on the third party, the account authorization page is displayed).

text: Collecting the above information is used to provide you with account login service and ensure your account security and prevent security risks.

If you refuse to authorize such information, you will not be able to use the account number of a third -party platform to record our platform, but it will not affect the normal use of other products and services we provide.

Important

Users cannot conduct recharge operations, chatting, chatting, chattingAnd other functions that are not allowed to provide according to the requirements of the competent authority.

text: 4. How do we store and protect your personal information
1. Information storage
1) Storage location: In accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations, we will only store the collected personal information in China and the People's Republic of China.

text: At present, we do not have a scenario that stores your personal information or provide personal information overseas for the time being.

text: If it is indeed necessary to perform cross -border transmission of data, we will clearly notify you (including data out, the purpose of the realm, the receiver, the method and scope of usage, the use of content, security measures, security risks, etc.), andWith your authorization consent, we will ensure that the data receiver has sufficient data protection capabilities to protect your personal information.

rewrite: If it is really necessary to conduct data cross -border transmission, you will clearly inform you alone and obtain your authorization consent.

text: 2) Storage period: We will keep your personal information within the shortest period necessary to provide you with products and services, for example: when you use our registration and membership functions, we need to collect your mobile phone number , and after you provide it and during your use of this function, we need to keep saving your mobile phone number in order to provide you with this function normally and protect your account and system security.

8. Law application and dispute resolution 1. This "Lilith Game Privacy Agreement" shall apply, fulfillment, interpretation, and dispute resolution.
2. If the two parties have any controversy on the content or performance of the "Lilith Game Privacy Agreement", the two parties should be friendly and negotiated;
When the negotiation is not achieved, either party shall file a lawsuit with the People's Court of Xuhui District, Shanghai.
3. The title of all the terms of this agreement is only convenient to read. There is no practical meaning in itself, and it cannot be used as the basis for explaining the meaning of this agreement.
